Book a computer

Choose where you’d like to book a computer.

If you don’t have a card number or don’t remember your PIN please contact customer service:

  • help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
  • 01473 351249

Privacy & cookies

By using our site you agree to our use of cookies. Find out what cookies we use, how they affect you and how you can control them: our cookie policy.
